Trento Innsbruck Quantum Information Tour
keyboard_arrow_down

Due to the measures recently adopted in order to contain COVID-19 spreading, the event won't take place in March. Participants will be informed about eventual rescheduling as soon as possible.

supervisor_account

Who

40 Physics students of whom:

  • 20 among AISF (Associazione Italiana Studenti di Fisica) members
  • 20 among IAPS (International Association of Physics Students) members

today

When

From the 23rd to the 26th March 2020

location_on

Where

The first two days will be spent in Trento visiting the University and FBK labs, the other two in Innsbruck at the IQOQI research center and the university

send

The Trento-Innsbruck Quantum Information Tour is an event organised by AISF Trento (Local Committee of the Italian Association of Physics Students AISF) in collaboration with AISF: it will bring 40 enthusiast students to visit some of the most advanced research facilities in Trento and Innsbruck and is conceived to showcase research mainly in the field of Quantum Information and Quantum Science.

Associazione Italiana Studenti di Fisica

The Associazione Italiana Studenti di Fisica (AISF) gathers together most of the Italian physics students. It was founded in Heidelberg in August 2014 and since January 2015 is a National Committee for the International Association of Physics Students (IAPS).
